author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: Elsa Pataky And Her "Home And Away" Star Husband Rocked The Golden Globes Red Carpet
text:
View this image › 
Bei / BEI/Shutterstock ID: 10286769 2. She even brought along some man-candy in the form of her husband Chris Hemsworth, giving him a night off from the kids! View this image › 
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10286773 3. Elsa looked amazing in this stunning silver number. View this image › 
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images And while neither Elsa or her husband were up for an award, the two still looked like winners.
ID: 10286781 4. Known for her role in the Fast and the Furious franchise, Elsa’s husband is best known for his role as The New Vet on The Saddle Club , and as Kim Hyde on Home and Away . Network Seven
